# Proofread a section of the tutorial

---
description: This prompt is used to proofread and edit sections of the Processing Shaders tutorial for clarity, grammar, and technical accuracy.
model: GPT-5.2
---

Please proofread and edit a selected section of the Processing Shaders tutorial for clarity, grammar, and technical accuracy. Ensure that the explanations are easy to understand for beginners while maintaining technical correctness. Make any necessary corrections or improvements.

Use INSTRUCTIONS.md, NOTES.md, TODO.md, and OUTLINE_WIP.md as references.

Make suggestions to improve the section based on the following tasks:

1. Correct any grammatical errors or awkward phrasing.
2. Clarify any technical explanations that may be confusing to beginners.
3. Ensure that all terminology is used consistently with the rest of the tutorial.
4. Suggest additional examples or analogies if they would help clarify complex concepts.
5. Add descriptive alt tags to markdown images for accessibility.
6. Ensure that punctuation and formatting follow standard conventions.
7. Look for opportunities to remove extraneous words or redundant phrases to make the text more concise.
8. Look for any factual inaccuracies or outdated information and suggest corrections.
9. Look for more technically accurate ways to explain concepts without losing beginner-friendliness.

Provide a brief explanation of the changes made.
